title: 07/06/21 DPS Hour 1
itunes:title: 07/06/21 DPS Hour 1
description:
Jason McIntyre and LaVar Arrington, in for Dan, are gearing up for Game 1 of the NBA Finals and while LaVar is excited to see some new blood, Jason questions the legitimacy of the Suns who got through injury riddled teams. They see both sides of the Rachel Nichols-Maria Taylor story and pump the brakes on cancel culture coming for Rachel Nichols. Plus, Aaron Rodgers addresses his mental health over the offseason.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
